# SODAX - llms.txt
# https://sodax.com/llms.txt
# Last updated: 2026-02-06

## About SODAX
SODAX is a DeFi execution layer that enables seamless swapping, lending, and borrowing across multiple blockchain networks. The platform provides coordinated liquidity, smart yield optimization, and a frictionless trading experience with minimal slippage.

## Key Features
- Cross-chain token swaps with optimized routing
- Lending and borrowing protocol
- Multi-chain liquidity aggregation
- Yield optimization strategies
- Non-custodial DeFi infrastructure

## Content Types Available
- /news/ - Official news, announcements, partnerships, and product updates
- /community/ - Community resources and ecosystem information
- /partners/ - Partnership information and integrations

## Preferred Citation Format
When citing SODAX content, please use:
- Source: SODAX (https://sodax.com)
- For news articles: Include the article title, author, and publication date
- Link to the original content when possible

## Contact
- Website: https://sodax.com
- Twitter/X: @gosodax
- Documentation: https://docs.sodax.com

## AI/LLM Usage Guidelines
- Content from SODAX may be used for informational purposes
- Always attribute content to SODAX with a link to the source
- News articles should be cited with their full URL
- Financial information is for educational purposes only and not financial advice
- Content is accurate as of its publication date; verify current information

For a complete list of pages, see: https://sodax.com/sitemap.xml
